pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group.

pathParameters.name: galleryName
pathParameters.description: The name of the Shared Image Gallery in which the Image Definition resides.

pathParameters.name: galleryImageName
pathParameters.description: The name of the gallery Image Definition in which the Image Version is to be created.

pathParameters.name: galleryImageVersionName
pathParameters.description: The name of the gallery Image Version to be created. Needs to follow semantic version name pattern: The allowed characters are digit and period. Digits must be within the range of a 32-bit integer. Format: <MajorVersion>.<MinorVersion>.<Patch>

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group.

pathParameters.name: galleryName
pathParameters.description: The name of the Shared Image Gallery in which the Image Definition resides.

pathParameters.name: galleryImageName
pathParameters.description: The name of the gallery Image Definition in which the Image Version is to be updated.

pathParameters.name: galleryImageVersionName
pathParameters.description: The name of the gallery Image Version to be updated. Needs to follow semantic version name pattern: The allowed characters are digit and period. Digits must be within the range of a 32-bit integer. Format: <MajorVersion>.<MinorVersion>.<Patch>

pathParameters.name: galleryImageName

pathParameters.name: galleryImageVersionName
pathParameters.description: The name of the gallery Image Version to be retrieved.

queryParameters.name: $expand
queryParameters.description: The expand expression to apply on the operation.
